name: Name
desc: The base name may be expanded by runes and will be shown on the item if no display name is set.

name: Display name
desc: The display name will be shown instead of the name if set. The display name can be changed later.

name: Bulk
desc: The bulk of the item is usually either nothing (leave the field empty), L for light bulk or a number.

name: Bulk when unequipped
desc: Some items (like backpacks) are bulkier when carried or stowed than they are equipped. Set the bulk of the item when carried here, if different.

name: Stack size
desc: An item's bulk is only counted per full stack. For example, arrows come in stacks of 10. The stack size is 1 for most items.

name: Price
desc: The money worth of the item in copper pieces (1SP is 10CP, 1GP is 100CP and 1PP is 1000CP)

name: Description
desc: The description will be shown on the item and can be as detailed as needed.

name: Traits
desc: The item's traits are listed on the item. An item must have the Invested trait to be invested.

name: Subtype
desc: Items can come in different subtypes, like 'Lesser', 'Greater', etc.

name: Subtype Description
desc: If the item has a subtype, describe the difference between this subtype and the regular item here.

name: Notes
desc: Notes that can be displayed on the item. The notes can be changed later.

name: Proficiency
desc: The proficiency used for this weapon or armor decides its effectiveness.

name: Hands
desc: The number of free hands needed to effectively use this item.

name: Usage
desc: The way that this item is used.

name: Equippable
desc: If this is set, the item can be equipped and unequipped.

name: Modification type
desc: The modification type decides what, if any, runes and materials can be applied to this item.

name: Individual actions or activities
desc: Add a definition of what happens when this item is activated. It can include, for exmaple, numeral effects, casting spells or adding items for the duration.

name: Known actions or activities
desc: Add a known action or activity that should be triggered when this item is activated.

name: Time required to use
desc: Number of actions to use this item. Can be free or reaction, or an individual amount of time, like 1 hour.

name: Activation type
desc: Type of action used to activate this item.

name: Influenced attributes
desc: You can show a hint to this Item on specific parts of the character sheet, e.g. on individual skills.

name: Hint text
desc: This text will be displayed on mouseover of the item hint. If no hint text is given, the item description will be shown instead.

name: Numeral effects
desc: These effects will be applied when the item is equipped, invested or activated.

name: Affected attribute
desc: The effect will be applied to this attribute.

name: Effect value
desc: This is the number by which the attribute will change.

name: Cause condition
desc: Add known conditions that will be caused by using this item.

name: Condition value
desc: Some conditions come with a value that influences how grave their effects are.

name: Decreasing Value
desc: If this is set, the value decreases by 1 every turn until it is removed at 0.

name: Condition duration
desc: The duration of the condition upon activation, in turns*10 or -1 for permanent.

name: Condition source
desc: The condition will show this as its source. Should usually be the item name.

name: Grant additional Items
desc: Add a known condition that will be caused by using this item.

name: Item
desc: Add a known item that will be granted when receiving or equipping this item.
todo: if name is set, type must be set to the correct type automatically

name: Grant condition
desc: The extra item is either granted when receiving this item, or granted when equipping and lost when unequipping it.

name: Amount
desc: The number of items of this type you will receive.
